items.question: What amenities are included in my apartment rental in the building?
items.answer: Residents at Howard Grant enjoy a full suite of amenities, including a fully-equipped fitness center, yoga studio, saltwater pool, sauna, games lounge, sundeck, and more. Additional conveniences include underground parking, secure storage options and beautiful [outdoor spaces](https://lepineapartments.com/newsroom/beyond-concrete-jungles) for relaxation.

items.question: Is the building smoke free?
items.answer: Yes, all of our buildings are entirely smoke free.

items.question: Are pets allowed?
items.answer: Yes, pets are welcome at Lépine Apartments! We welcome your furry friends, but residents must declare any pets on their application form and follow our pet policy. [Contact our leasing team](#contact) for more details on our pet policy.

items.question: Is parking available?
items.answer: Yes, indoor heated parking and outdoor parking is available for an extra cost per month.

items.question: How do I schedule a tour of the apartments?
items.answer: To schedule a tour of our apartments in Barrhaven, simply contact us by [contact form](#contact), phone or [email](mailto:leasing@lepineapartments.com). Our team will happily show you around the property and help you find your new rental apartment in Barrhaven.

items.question: Do you offer furnished apartments?
items.answer: We currently do not offer furnished suites.

items.question: Do the apartments come with private outdoor space?
items.answer: Select suites come with a private outdoor terrace or balcony.

items.question: Are utilities included in the apartment rental?
items.answer: Utilities are an extra monthly cost and are metered separately for your convenience.

items.question: Are the apartments air conditioned?
items.answer: Yes, all suites offer individual climate-controlled heat pumps.

items.question: What types of apartments are available at Howard Grant?
items.answer: We offer a range of spacious 1-bedroom and 2-bedroom apartments, including rental apartments with dedicated home office spaces. Each suite has modern finishes and open layouts to create a comfortable, spacious living space.

items.question: What is the application process like to rent an apartment?
items.answer: The application process is simple! Simply give us a call and we can either walk you through it or send you a lease application form for your apartment rental in Barrhaven.

items.question: What is the lease term?
items.answer: The minimum lease term for our apartment rentals is 12 months but many of our residents sign multi-year leases. For more details or customized lease options, [please contact our leasing office](#contact).

items.question: How do I schedule a tour of the apartment?
items.answer: To schedule a tour of our Barrhaven apartment rentals, simply fill out our [contact form](#contact), give us a call or [send us an email](mailto:leasing@lepineapartments.com).

items.question: What makes Barrhaven a great place to live?
items.answer: Barrhaven is known for its family-friendly environment, vibrant community, and excellent amenities. With schools, parks, shopping and dining options all nearby, it’s a neighbourhood that truly has it all.

items.question: What is near Howard Grant?
items.answer: Howard Grant is ideally situated near major shopping centers, schools, restaurants, and recreational facilities, making it an exceptional location for modern living.

items.question: Is Barrhaven easily accessible?
items.answer: Yes, Barrhaven is well-connected by public transit and major roadways, making it easy to navigate and reach downtown Ottawa.

items.question: Is Barrhaven a good place to raise a family?
items.answer: Absolutely! With excellent schools, safe neighbourhoods and [family-focused activities](https://lepineapartments.com/newsroom/family-friendly-living), Barrhaven is perfect for families. Our Barrhaven apartment rentals offer family-friendly living all under one roof.

items.question: Is Barrhaven a walkable neighbourhood?
items.answer: Yes, with pedestrian-friendly streets and easy access to parks, shops and transit options, Barrhaven is ideal for walking.
